content:
afonso360 commented on issue #5888:

Sorry about mixing in the alu_{and,addi} changes everywhere (I can move that to a separate PR if you need, let me know).

This is the PR that made me start thinking about adding those in. This ISLE rule without those is really big and a lot harder to read.

afonso360 edited a comment on issue #5888:

Sorry about mixing in the alu_{and,addi} changes everywhere (I can move that to a separate PR if you need, let me know).

This is the PR that made me start thinking about adding those in for all instructions. This ISLE rule without those is really big and a lot harder to read.
